# bunkerweb_run_jobs (Ephemeral Resource)

Triggers one or more scheduler jobs via the BunkerWeb API during planning or apply.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "bunkerweb" {
  api_endpoint = "https://127.0.0.1:8888"
  # Bearer token Auth
  api_token = var.api_token # If you choose to use Bearer Token configured in your API deployment
  # OR Basic Auth
  api_username = var.api_username # Basic Auth configured in your API deployment.
  api_password = var.api_password # required with api_username to work.
}

ephemeral "bunkerweb_run_jobs" "trigger" {
  jobs = [{
    plugin = "reporter"
    name   = "daily"
  }]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `jobs` (Attributes List) Jobs to trigger, defined by plugin and optional job name. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--jobs))

<a id="nestedatt--jobs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `jobs`

Required:

- `plugin` (String) Plugin identifier owning the job.

Optional:

- `name` (String) Optional job name; omit to target all jobs exposed by the plugin.
